Welcome to yappcap’s documentation!¶

yappcap is a Python wrapper around libpcap. There are many pcap libraries for Python, but none are full-featured, actively maintained, and well-documented. yappcap aims to rectify this situation.

  • Dealing with network interfaces
    • Interfaces
    • Interface addresses
  • Live captures
    • Capturing traffic
  • Offline captures
    • Processing an offline capture
